universal_rules.description: Partial credit given for correct method even with wrong final answer
Answers exceeding expected length get no extra marks per marker instructions
Correct numerical answer without unit loses 0.5 mark per instance
2-4 marks per diagram; not drawing = guaranteed marks lost
Must show working; direct answer without steps may lose method marks
